ygData.subject: Re: What does it mean that divination is 65 as oppose to 66
ygData.msgSnippet: the increase in div for us clerics means how many times we fizzle invis to undead and i believe might have something to do with how long the spell stays
ygData.messageBody:
the increase in div for us clerics means how many times we fizzle invis to
undead and i believe might have something to do with how long the spell stays
up....and have you noticed that on the recent patch that it'll warn you before
invis wears? haven't tried this with invis to undead yet tho, but i did get a
warning when on with my druid earlier that said i felt like i was about to
return to view in bright red text....then a few seconds later, invis
faded....nice addition imho

Chas Watkins wrote:

> From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>
> My question is how does the increase help in spell casting, or how well it
> is resisted etc?
